short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates gross rental yield.  Uses listing price when viewing a Zoopla, Rightmove or OnTheMarket property.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This adds a small but useful extension to your Chrome toolbar for calculating the potential gross rental yield on a property.

Enter the property purchase price and expected monthly rental income and gross rental yield will be calculated for you.

When viewing a Zoopla, Rightmove or OnTheMarket property listing, the property price is automatically populated from the listing being viewed.

Are there features you'd like to see or is something not working?  Contact me and I'll see what I can do to help!

I really hope you enjoy using this extension

Hugo

2024-02-22:
Added support for OnTheMarket
2024-02-14:
Added support for Rightmove
